column5: shall be present and equal to 1.
shall be present and equal to monochrome2.
shall be  present and equal to 16 or 32.
shall be equal to bits allocated.
shall be one less than bits stored.
shall have the value 0 = unsigned integer.  negative dose values shall not be present.
shall be equal to the enumerated value gy.
shall be equal to the defined term physical.
shall be present and not empty if referenced rt plan sequence (300c,0002) is missing, in which case it should have the same value as rt plan description.
shall be present if  dose summation type (3004,000a) has the value plan.
first z coordinate shall be equal to zero.  the remaining z coordinates shall be relative to the starting z position in image position (patient) (0020,0032).
shall be present but may be null.  the value shall be given if known.
